com.google.template.soy.jssrc.restricted
Interface SoyJsSrcPrintDirective

All Superinterfaces:
SoyPrintDirective
All Known Implementing Classes:
BidiSpanWrapDirective, BidiUnicodeWrapDirective, ChangeNewlineToBrDirective, EscapeHtmlDirective, EscapeJsDirective, EscapeUriDirective, IdDirective, InsertWordBreaksDirective, NoAutoescapeDirective
public interface SoyJsSrcPrintDirective
extends SoyPrintDirective

Interface for a Soy print directive implemented for the JS Source backend.

Important: This may only be used in implementing print directive plugins.

Method Summary
 JsExpr applyForJsSrc(JsExpr str, List<JsExpr> args)
          Applies this directive on the given string value.

getName, getValidArgsSizes, shouldCancelAutoescape
 

Method Detail

applyForJsSrc

JsExpr applyForJsSrc(JsExpr str,
                     List<JsExpr> args)
Applies this directive on the given string value.

Important note when implementing this method: The string value may not yet have been coerced to a string. You may need to explicitly coerce it to a string using the JS function String().

Parameters:
str - The string value to apply the directive on. This value may not yet have been coerced to a string.
args - The directive's arguments, if any (usually none).
Returns:
The resulting value.
